translation: The action {{.action_title}}, regarding case file {{.casefile_name}} was just completed by {{.assignee}}.
The following action was assigned to you: {{.action_title}}.
An action has been assigned to you
The action {{.action_title}} was just completed by {{.assignee}}.
{{.assignee}} rejected and reassigned this action to you ({{.action_title}}).
The following action is almost overdue: {{.action_title}}
The following action is almost overdue: {{.action_title}}, assigned to {{.assignee}}.
Warning! The following action is overdue: {{.action_title}}.
Warning! The following action is overdue: {{.action_title}}, assigned to {{.assignee}}.
{{.owner}} has reassigned the action {{.action_title}} to someone else. You are no longer responsible.
A new permission was given to you. You can now use {{.app_name}} as a/an {{.role}}. Click here to go to {{.app_name}}.
Your administrator has reset your password. Click here to create a new password.

translation.one: Successfully imported {{.number}} user. Click here to open AdminChanger and manage users.
translation.other: Successfully imported {{.number}} users. Click here to open AdminChanger and manage users.

translation: A new observation with severity {{.severity}} was just submitted by {{.observer}}.
Warning! A new observation with severity {{.severity}} was just submitted by {{.observer}}. This might require your immediate attention.
A new observation with severity {{.severity}} was just submitted by {{.observer}}. This observation has been automatically generated from inspection '{{ .template_name }} #{{ .inspection_number }}'.

Warning! A new observation with severity {{.severity}} was just submitted by {{.observer}}. This might require your immediate attention. This observation has been automatically generated from inspection '{{ .template_name }} #{{ .inspection_number }}'.
Warning! High priority observation generated from inspection
The following case file was assigned to you by {{.assigner}}: {{.casefile_name}}.
The following case file has not been updated for two weeks and is still open: {{.casefile_name}}.
Thank you for your observation! Your observation {{.refnumber}} has been archived by {{.manager}}.
Thank you for your observation! Your observation {{.refnumber}} is being processed by {{.manager}}.
{{ .assigner }} has assigned a new inspection '{{ .template_name }}' to you.

{{ if .failed }}Your request to create a template from a shared code has failed. You may have used a wrong or expired key, please try again.{{else}}Your request to create a template from a shared code has succeeded. It is now available under the name {{ .template }}.{{end}}
